description.en: Monero-Classic is Monero original chain retained after Monero team initiated hard fork at block height 1546000 to be anti-ASIC. Monero-Classic is based on CryptoNote protocol and retains all parameters and features of the original Monero chain. Monero-Classic team will continue to build the ecosystem based on original Monero features, making original chain of Monero and its surrounding ecosystem thrive.
